thing.title: Battery to breadboard clip
thing.author: MaskedRetriever
thing.description: I've designed one or two projects for which the breadboard itself was a significant structural component. In these cases, things might have been simplified by a clip to hold a 4xAA battery clip to the back. That's what this is for.Well, actually, it's for a larger project which should bevery nicewhen it gets done...
